contentList.content: Auntie Ethel's Hair
Consuming this piece of fey flesh grants a permanent +1 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>.
Two lice still scurry around on the little flap of skin attached to this clump of matted, crusty hair.
Potion of Dragon’s Flight
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

Grants the ability to soar through the skies over long distances, infused with the strength and majesty of a dragon. The bottle contains a shimmering golden liquid that glows with an inner fire, radiating power and ancient magic. Once consumed, the user is imbued with the flight capabilities of a dragon - swift, powerful, and commanding - allowing them to glide effortlessly through the air and cover vast distances with ease, like a dragon in flight.
Potion of Wind Flying
Feature Removal Ritual Skull
Removes all Bloodright features from the user.
This skull's vacant eye sockets seem to draw you in, inviting you to join it in emptiness.
Grant Feature: Bite
Grants Bite: You can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DUF_Spell_FeralBite">bite</LSTag> a target to deal Piercing damage using a <LSTag Tooltip="BonusAction">Bonus Action</LSTag>.
The humanoid jaw can produce a shocking amount of force for its size!
Rack of Soaring Elixirs

This simple, wooden rack holds a variety of potions, each granting the user a unique ability to take flight. The bottles are lined up in an orderly fashion, their contents varying from crackling storm-like liquids to gentle, misty concoctions. Despite the rack's plain design, each bottle radiates a quiet, powerful energy, ready to grant the drinker the ability to soar through the air.
Potion of Soaring Ambition
Permanently gain the Fly ablity. Unlimited uses.

This blood-red potion bubbles and churns as if boiling, but feels cool when it touches your lips. The taste is bitter, with a hint of... whiskey? Try not to think about what it may have been brewed from as the chunks slide down your gullet.
Elixir of Lightning Resistance
Drink

You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Lightning damage and can no longer be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHOCKED">Shocked</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHOCKED_SURFACE">Electrocuted</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING_AURA_ELECTRIFIED">Jolted</LSTag>, or otherwise affected by lightning. This elixir can be thrown at a target to apply its effects.
This potion causes a tingling sensation in the extremities when consumed.
Elixir of Resistance: Lightning
Elixir of Necrotic Resistance
Drink
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Necrotic damage. This elixir can be thrown at a target to apply its effects.
Smells of fresh herbs and berries. Some say flowers placed within will bloom indefinitely.
Elixir of Resistance: Necrotic
Elixir of Poison Resistance
Drink

You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Poison damage and can no longer be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisoned</LSTag>. This elixir can be thrown at a target to apply its effects.
Popular among politicians and adventurers alike.
Elixir of Resistance: Poison
Elixir of Psychic Resistance
Drink
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Psychic damage. This elixir can be thrown at a target to apply its effects.
This potion, reminiscent of whiskey in taste but not effect, is known to cause temporary ringing in the ears.
Elixir of Resistance: Psychic
Elixir of Lightning Resistance
Drink

You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Lightning damage and can no longer be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHOCKED">Shocked</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHOCKED_SURFACE">Electrocuted</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING_AURA_ELECTRIFIED">Jolted</LSTag>, or otherwise affected by lightning. This elixir can be thrown at a target to apply its effects.
This potion causes a tingling sensation in the extremities when consumed.
Elixir of Resistance: Lightning
Arsonist's Oil

Coat your weapon in an oil that strips targets that are Resistant to Fire damage of their Resistance.

Targets that are Immune to Fire damage are unaffected.

'It was then that Swires tossed the oil. It splattered the cambion, and all at once its skin of brilliant carmine dulled to dark, a red like cheap wine, and the fiend vented this sound of anguish I almost pitied, for its very affinity for fire was now undone.'
Scroll of Remove Curse
Auntie Ethel's Boon
Eating Ethel's hairy scalp has granted you a permanent boost to Intelligence.
Eating Ethel's hairy scalp has granted you a permanent boost to Intelligence.
Tempestuous Magic

After you cast a Level 1 spell or higher you can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly_TempestuousMagic">Fly</LSTag> as a <LSTag Tooltip="Bonus_Action">bonus action</LSTag> until the end of your turn without receiving <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.
Thunder Wind Flight
Fly to a nearby spot without receiving <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.
Tempestuous Magic: Flight
Fly to a nearby spot without receiving <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.
Tempestuous Magic

After you cast a Level 1 spell or higher you can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly_TempestuousMagic">Fly</LSTag> as a <LSTag Tooltip="Bonus_Action">bonus action</LSTag> until the end of your turn without receiving <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.
Potion of Flying
Potion of Thunderwhirl Drift - Thunder
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

Grants the ability to soar to the target location, engulfed in a harmless storm of rumbling thunder. The bottle contains a deep gray liquid that shivers with faint, rolling sound. Once consumed, the user glides through the air surrounded by low, echoing thunderclaps - an awe-inspiring, yet gentle display of stormborn majesty that leaves no harm, only reverence in its wake.
Potion of Flying
Potion of Stormfall Impact - Thunder Harmful
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

Grants the ability to unleash a thunderous strike upon landing, damaging all nearby and evaporating any water in the area. The bottle crackles with volatile energy, its stormy liquid swirling with arcs of lightning. Once consumed, the user becomes charged with thunderous force - when they land, the ground erupts with a booming shockwave that scorches the area dry and strikes all caught in its blast.
Potion of Tunder Boom Flying
Thunder Boom Flingt
Fly to a nearby spot without receiving <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.
Potion of Swift Ascent
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

Grants the ability to fly for a short distance, allowing the user to hover or glide briefly through the air. The bottle contains a light, clear liquid that shimmers faintly as though infused with air itself. Once consumed, the user gains the ability to take flight for a limited time, rising quickly and smoothly, before gently landing back on the ground.
Potion of Basic Flying
Potion of Dragon Flying
Chromatic Orb: Thunder
Hurl a sphere of thunderous energy.
Divine Strike: Thunder (Ranged)
Deal an additional [1].
Concussion Grenade
The grenade explodes for [1].
Hammer Impact
Thunder Boom Flingt
Fly to a target position.
Fly to a target position.
Boots of Stormy Clamour
Peals of thunder rumble at the back of your skull with every step taken in these boots.
Arcane Echomalefaction
When the wearer inflicts a condition upon a hostile creature, they also inflict [1] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_THUNDER_REVERBERATION">Reverberation</LSTag>.
Bonespike Boots
Armour designed for the aerodynamic leaping and striking and general screaming of your standard barbarian.
The Watersparkers

An enormous storm was raging the first time Yrre the Sparkstruck left the Underdark. The deep gnome's interest in lightning became at once an all-consuming obsession, and they would spend the rest of their years striving to recreate that storm's power themselves.
Helldusk Boots
No ore takes better to being forged than the infernal iron of Avernus, where the archdevil Zariel presides.
Potion of Sorcerous Flight
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

Grants the ability to fly to a nearby spot without provoking OpportunityAttack. The bottle contains a shimmering, mist-like fluid that shifts in and out of view. Once consumed, the user becomes momentarily incorporeal, slipping through space with arcane grace. Their movement is sudden and silent, untouched by foes - an elegant escape borne of pure sorcery.
Potion of Sorc Wind Flying
Sorc Flight
Fly to a nearby spot without receiving <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.
Potion of Static Drift - Electric
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

Grants the ability to soar to the target location, surrounded by a harmless surge of crackling electricity. The bottle contains a shimmering, pale blue liquid that gently hums with energy. Once consumed, the user is enveloped in an electric aura, with sparks harmlessly arcing around them as they fly. The electricity is purely visual, offering a vibrant and dynamic display without causing any harm to the user or those nearby.
Potion of Thunderous Surge - Electric Harmful
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

Upon landing, this potion strikes the target and forms an electrified layer of water on the ground, crackling with energy. The bottle is filled with a shimmering, translucent liquid that pulses with electric charge. Once consumed, the potion releases a surge of power, transforming the ground into a dangerous, electrified surface that crackles with lightning, ready to shock anyone who steps too close.
Potion of Icy Drift - Cold
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

Grants the ability to fly to the target position, surrounded by swirling snow and biting frost. The cold mist is purely atmospheric, creating a chilling effect without causing harm. The bottle contains a cool, crystal-clear liquid, faintly glowing with a soft blue hue. As the potion is consumed, the user becomes enveloped in a gentle snowstorm, with flurries of snow and frost swirling around them, offering a beautiful, harmless display of winter’s touch.
Potion of Frostbound Impact - Cold Harmful
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

Upon landing, this potion strikes the target with a chilling force, freezing the surroundings and creating a patch of ice that spreads out in all directions. The bottle is filled with a frosty, pale-blue liquid that shimmers with cold energy. Once consumed, the potion releases an overwhelming wave of freezing power, encasing the area in ice and frost, causing harm to anyone trapped within the frozen zone.
Potion of Molten Fury - Fire Harmful
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

This powerful potion grants the drinker the ability to soar through the skies, surrounded by an aura of fierce, swirling flames. Upon striking the target on land, it causes the earth to melt, forming a scorching patch of flames that burns everything within its reach. The bottle is filled with a glowing, molten orange liquid that flickers like a living flame, radiating intense heat and power.
Potion of Blazing Passage - Fire
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

Grants the ability to fly to the target position, surrounded by a harmless yet intense blazing inferno. The fire engulfs the user without causing any harm, creating a dramatic, fiery aura that illuminates the surroundings. The bottle is filled with a vivid, fiery liquid that flickers like molten lava, its warm glow hinting at the fiery spectacle it unleashes, all while remaining safe for the user.
Potion of Shadow-Cursed Growth - Necrotic Harmful
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

Upon landing, this potion strikes the target and forms a patch of Shadow-Cursed Vines on the ground, twisting and writhing with dark energy. The bottle is filled with a dark, viscous liquid that seems to pulse with an unsettling power, like the essence of forgotten magic. Once consumed, the ground is overtaken by these cursed vines, which spread rapidly, their thorns and shadows seeking to ensnare anything in their path.
Potion of Necrotic Drift - Necrotic
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

Grants the ability to soar to the target location, enveloped in a chilling necrotic aura that does not harm but leaves a cold, eerie presence in the air. The bottle contains a dark, swirling liquid that exudes an unsettling, faintly greenish glow. Once consumed, the user is surrounded by a soft, necrotic mist, its touch freezing the air around them without causing any harm - only a haunting, otherworldly atmosphere in their wake.
Potion of Poisonous Mist - Poison
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

Grants the ability to soar to the target location, enveloped in a harmless noxious poison fog. The bottle contains a faintly greenish liquid, swirling gently within, with an aura of pungent but non-lethal fumes. Once consumed, the user is surrounded by the fog, which looks ominous and thick, but causes no harm to the user or those nearby - only leaving a slight, unsettling haze in the air.
Potion of Toxic Impact - Poison Harmful
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

Upon landing, this potion strikes the target, spreading a toxic puddle across the ground that corrodes and poisons all in its path. The bottle contains a viscous, sickly green liquid that bubbles with dangerous energy. Once consumed, the potion releases a noxious cloud, followed by the spread of venomous toxins that sizzle on the ground, capable of poisoning anyone unfortunate enough to step into the hazardous puddle.
Potion of Mindglide - Psychic
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

Grants the ability to soar to the target location, enveloped in a swirling aura of harmless psychic energy. The bottle holds a translucent, iridescent liquid that glimmers like thought itself. Once consumed, the user is gently surrounded by a flow of psychic currents.
Potion of Psychic Resonance - Psychic Harmful
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.
This potion grants the drinker the ability to release a powerful wave of psychic energy upon will. The bottle contains a shimmering, violet liquid, swirling with mental force.
Potion of Sacred Flamefall - Radiant Harmful
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

Grants the ability to summon holy fire upon landing, engulfing the ground beneath in radiant, purifying flames. The potion’s golden liquid glows with divine warmth, flickering like a consecrated flame. Once consumed, the user becomes infused with celestial energy, and when they land, holy fire erupts in their wake - cleansing and burning all that stands in defiance of its light.
Potion of Blessed Ascent - Radiant
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

Grants the ability to soar to the target location, enveloped in a harmless, radiant glow of holy power. The bottle contains a luminous, golden liquid that pulses gently with divine light. Once consumed, the user is surrounded by a warm, brilliant aura that shines like a beacon of hope - purely aesthetic, offering no harm, only a comforting, sacred presence as they travel through the air.
Potion of Needle Rain - Blood Harmful
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

This vile concoction unleashes a swarm of invisible needles that pierce the target and everything within range on land. The bottle is grotesquely filled with a disturbing mixture of organs and gore, the thick liquid sloshing with an unsettling viscosity. The faint sound of whispering in the liquid suggests a connection to something far darker. It’s a potion of hidden torment, meant to strike unseen and leave nothing untouched.
Potion of Crimson Drift -Blood Harmful
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

This potion allows the drinker to soar to the target location, enveloped in a harmless yet eerie crimson haze. The bottle is filled with unsettling gore, its contents pulsing like the remnants of a twisted ritual. The viscous liquid swirls darkly inside, and though it may appear dangerous, the haze it creates is entirely harmless - only offering an unsettling, blood-red mist that gently surrounds the user as they fly.
Potion of Acidic Aegis - Acid Harmful
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

Unleashes the ability to strike a target while flying, landing with a burst that leaves a sizzling puddle of acid on the ground. This potion is as light as a feather, so delicate that you might imagine it floating like a lilypad on the surface of the air if tossed high enough.
Potion of Corrosive Veil - Acid
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

Grants the ability to fly to the target position, surrounded by a harmless yet dense cloud of corrosive acid. This cloud doesn’t harm, but instead creates an unsettling, misty aura around you. The potion’s bottle is light, its contents swirling with a translucent green hue, like mist trapped in liquid form.
Potion of Lightning Boom Flying
Potion of Lightning Flying
Lightning Wind Flight
Fly to a nearby spot without receiving <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.
Lightning Boom Flingt
Acid Wind Flight
Fly to a nearby spot without receiving <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.
Acid Boom Flingt
Potion of Necro Flying
Potion of Necro Boom Flying
Potion of Blood Flying
Potion of Blood Boom Flying
Potion of Fire Flying
Potion of Fire Boom Flying
Potion of Frost Flying
Potion of Frost Boom Flying
Potion of Necro Flying
Potion of Necro Boom Flying
Potion of Poison Flying
Potion of Poison Boom Flying
Potion of Psy Flying
Potion of Psy Boom Flying
Potion of Radiant Flying
Potion of Radiant Boom Flying
Dragon Fly
Basic Fly
Blood Wind Flight
Blood Boom Flingt
Fire Wind Flight
Fire Boom Flingt
Frost Wind Flight
Frost Boom Flingt
Necro Wind Flight
Necro Boom Flingt
Poison Wind Flight
Poison Boom Flingt
Psy Wind Flight
Psy Boom Flingt
Radiant Wind Flight
Radiant Boom Flingt
Elixir of Dragonborn Prowess: Frost

You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Intimidation and Persuasion <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Cold damage, and can use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MOO_BloodPotion_IceStorm">Ice Storm</LSTag> once until your next <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
One of Blood Vendor Araj Obladra's elixirs, distilled from a specific sanguine quality, and with properties aligned to an equally specific race.
Extravagant Potion Bottle
An alchemist's bottle ornamented with exquisite precious metals. Likely meant for someone of high stature.
Potion of Regeneration

Gain the ability to cast Gust of Wind once, blasting a line of wind that pushes creatures away, extinguishes flames, and disperses gases.

The howl of wind can be heard within this lightly vibrating bottle.
Bottled Breath
Gain the ability to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_GustOfWind">Gust of Wind</LSTag> once.
The howl of wind can be heard within this lightly vibrating bottle.
Elixir of Immortality
Potion Bottle
An alchemist's bottle. A candle set into its base warms any draught contained within.
Potion of Vitality
Drink
Cures any poison or disease.
A coveted restorative for the adventurer on their last legs.
Potion of Eternal Night - Darkness Harmful
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

Upon striking the target, this potion unleashes an intense wave of pitch-black darkness, blinding all within its reach. The bottle is filled with a thick, inky liquid that seems to absorb light, its surface swirling with shadows as if alive. When consumed, the drinker becomes a conduit for the abyss, summoning a suffocating blackness that blinds and disorients anyone caught within its embrace.
Potion of Shadowed Flight - Darkness
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

Grants the ability to soar to the target location, enveloped in an impenetrable darkness that poses no harm to those nearby. The bottle is filled with a deep, swirling black liquid, almost as if it contains the essence of night itself. The darkness it creates is thick and foreboding, but it’s harmless, acting as a veil to conceal the user as they move through the air without causing harm to others.
Potion of Grounding - Clean the Fly Abilities
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

This peculiar brew has the power to cleanse all flight abilities granted by other potions, grounding the user entirely. The bottle is filled with a thick, dark liquid that seems to pulse with a faint, rhythmic throb, almost as if it’s resisting its own power. When consumed, the liquid quickly dissipates into the air like dust, and with it, all effects of flight vanish, leaving the user firmly planted on the ground.
Dark Wind Flight
Dark Boom Flingt
Potion of Dark Flying
Potion of Dark Boom Flying
Potion of Sporecalm Descent - Spore Harmful
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

Grants the ability to unleash a spore-filled cloud upon landing, gently pacifying all within its reach. The bottle contains a soft, greenish mist that swirls with tiny glowing flecks, like drifting pollen. Once consumed, the user becomes a conduit of natural stillness - upon touching down, a tranquil cloud bursts forth, calming minds and easing aggression with the subtle power of enchanted spores.
Potion of Gentle Bloom - Spore
Drink to gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.

Grants the ability to soar to the target location, enveloped by a swirling cloud of harmless spores. The bottle holds a soft, amber-toned liquid flecked with tiny floating motes. Once consumed, the user drifts through the air in a slow, graceful arc, trailed by a gentle cloud of spores that dance and shimmer harmlessly - an elegant display of nature’s magic in motion.
Potion of Spore Flying
Potion of Spore Boom Flying
Spore Wind Flight
Spore Boom Flingt
Potion of Fly Cleaning
Potion of Fly Cleaning
Bottle Rack
A small collection of various tinctures and tonics.
Soar to the target location, engulfed in a storm of rumbling thunder.
Unleashes a thunderous strike on the landing, dealing damage to all nearby and evaporating the water.
Soar to the target location, engulfed in a surge of crackling electricity.
Fly to the target position, surrounded by a corrosive acid cloud.
Soar to the target location, enveloped in a crimson haze.
Fly to the target position, surrounded by a blazing inferno.
Fly to the target position, surrounded by swirling snow and biting frost.
Soar to the target location, enveloped in a chilling necrotic aura.
Soar to the target location, engulfed in a noxious poison fog.
Soar to the target location, enveloped in a swirling psychic energy.
Soar to the target location, enveloped in a radiant glow of holy power.
Soar to the target location, engulfed in an impenetrable darkness.
Soar to the target location, enveloped by a swirling cloud of spores.
Strikes the target on landing, forming an electrified layer of water on the ground.
Hits the target on landing, leaving a puddle of acid sizzling on the ground.
Strikes the target on landing, melting the earth to form a searing patch of flames.
Strikes the target on landing, freezing the surroundings and creating a patch of ice.
Strikes the target on landing, forming a patch of Shadow-Cursed Vines on the ground.
Many invisible needles pierce the target and everything around it on landing.
Strikes the target on landing, spreading a toxic puddle across the ground.
On landing releases a wave of psychic energy that ripples across the land.
Strikes the target on landing, summoning holy fire to engulf the ground beneath.
Strikes the target and unleashes pitch-black darkness on landing, blinding all within its reach.
On landing unleashes a spore-filled cloud that soothes and pacifies all within its reach.
